name: CSM Dashboard in Notion
description: The most comprehensive CSM dashboardAll-in-one system for Customer Success Managers wanting to take control of their customer information and streamline their work.The CSM Dashboard is built in Notion and brings together KPIs, accounts information, contacts, projects & tasks, meeting notes and even product issues.Do you spend hours searching through documents to put together a status update on your book of business for your 1-1 with your manager?Do you have to switch between multiple apps to
features: Quarterly KPIs Tracker; High Impact Activities Tracker; Accounts & Contacts database; Projects Tracker; Meetings & Tasks calendar; Upcoming Renewals overview; Time Tracker; Product issues & feature requests tracker; Resource database for all your customer and personal documents; How to get started guide
